We are glad to host the 2025 Intermediate conference of the [Italian Statistical Society (SIS)](https://sis2025.sis-statistica.it/).

## Main conference

**When:** June, 16--18 2025\
**Where:** Genoa\
**What:** The conference aims at discussing the state-of-the-art on _innovations in statistics_ and _statistics for innovations_. For more details see the [SIS 2025 website](https://sis2025.sis-statistica.it/).

### Satellite

**When:** June, 19 2025\
**Where:** Pavia\
**What:** Details will be available soon.
